main event: An unidentified object approximately 40-50 feet in diameter was observed around 8 miles north of Julien, Kentucky at 0215 local time on June 7, 1954.
interesting points: The object was observed by a Ground Observer Corps member, who reported the sighting to Godman Air Force Base around 0230 hours.
The report states that the weather was clear with a few small scattered clouds, with unlimited visibility and ceiling.
Winds were light and variable, with a northeast direction.
A similar sighting was made at about the same time in Hopkinsville, Kentucky.
The report was approved by E.J. Ruppelt, and downgraded and declassified per DOD 5200.10.
sighted object: An unidentified object approximately 40-50 feet in diameter
